document.full_text: search teams bathed in the harsh glow of floodlights early on monday picked through rubble of neighborhoods and commercial districts demolished by a tornado that killed at least 30 people in the southwestern missouri town of joplin.
document.title: tornado kills at least 30 in joplin, missouri
lines_and_colors: search teams bathed in the harsh glow of floodlights early on monday picked through rubble of neighborhoods and commercial districts demolished by a tornado that killed at least 30 people in the southwestern missouri town of joplin.
